name: I'll catch my breath.
description:
I'll Catch My Breath is a short interactive interactive ascension through some thoughts. I created this game for the "world suicide prevention day" as a gentle reminder that I / we can keep going.

Float in a space of thoughts. Remember to breath. Stay alive.

How to play?

  • Use ZQSD / WASD to move around;
  • The bubbles will help you to breath;
  • Press [P] to pause;
  • The full text is available once you've reach the end.
